Author: vlad
Content:
Not to take away from positive aspects of YC that surely also merit attention, but when your (Paul Graham's) incubator-like program get mentioned in every single blog post and newspaper article about any of your companies, which leads to more mentions, that is viral marketing at its best.

Is that why it is called Y-Combinator (recursive/viral functionality is built-in?)

Author: vlad
Content: Do you think that investors tell new users to spend the most they can on lawyers and incorporation fees at the outset simply to get them to focus on one idea and also feel a money crunch?  Steve Pavlina says the only thing you NEED to start a business is an $8 domain name.  He suggests entrepreneurs to get one of those free for 6 month web hosting plans.

Author: aston
Content: True. I heard 25 from someone I trust more than Mike Arrington.

Content: yeah, the intro/failed kumbaya was excruciating. but the rest (ok, i only watched about a third of it) was well delivered, and pretty damn compelling.\n

Author: tx
Content: Whenever your friends and family start trying to avoid the subject of your startup in conversations, it's time to quit.\n
